input.sentences: my brother had a great idea to throw a pirate themed party .
he really got into the spirit .
his girlfriend played along | and brought her brother .
i was n't so into it | but my boyfriend was .
i got the tiara | and kept it even though it was a dig at my party pooper attitude . it was still a fun party .
output.sentences: Kurt and Ken were excited to throw their pirate themed party.
Kurt was really in the mood, waving his sword to and fro.
Lucas and his new girlfriend, Tina, showed up shortly after that party had begun.
Cindy, sporting a tiara, came with her boyfriend, Steven, also.
Maureen caused trouble when she stole Cindy's tiara and refused to give it back -- but the party was fun, nonetheless.
